text: == List of spokespersons == === Israel === Israel Defense Forces * Daniel Hagari === Palestine === Saraya Al-Quds: Abu Hamza (), is the nom de guerre of a Palestinian militant who is the spokesperson for the organization. == Related pages == * Palestinian Joint Operations Room == References == Category:Military wings of political parties Category:Articles with unsourced statements from February 2018 Category:All articles with unsourced statements Category:Articles containing Arabic-language text Category:Anti-Israeli sentiment Category:Palestinian militant groups Category:Palestinian Joint Operations Room Category:War propaganda Category:Propaganda in Israel Category:Propaganda Category:Military and warfare Category:Israel–Palestine conflict Category:Israel–Hamas war Category:Telegram (software) Category:Military units in the Levant Category:Israel Defense Forces Category:Saraya Al-Quds Category:Islamic Jihad Movement in Palestine Category:Palestinian Islamic Jihad Category:Military people by rank Category:Military people Category:Hasbara Category:Jihadist groups
title: Military spokespersons in the Israel–Palestine conflict
